name: Kya
info:
• 性别: 女
  • 种族: Water Tribe; Air Nomad
  • 国籍: Southern Water Tribe
  • 声优: Lisa Edelstein
detail: Kya is the second of Avatar Aang and Katara's three children and their only daughter, as well as the couple's only waterbending child. As such, she always felt a stronger connection with her mother.

jobs.name: The Legend of Korra Book 2: Spirits
jobs.nameCn: 科拉传奇 第二季：神灵
